img_above_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4e/Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg)| Tiger Relic| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases critical hit chance for a short duration. | Found beneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge (Requires Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone), on a platform above the slope down towards Xu Dog Need to jump as soon as you start sliding | Tiger Relic
![Goat Skull .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f9/Goat_Skull_.jpg)| Goat Skull| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases maximum health for a short duration. | Chance to be found when picking up Licorice plants | Goat Skull
img_below_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker
![Breath Of Fire .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0d/Breath_Of_Fire_.jpg)| Breath Of Fire| Epic | Using the gourd significantly increases attack for the next Unveiling Strike in Cloud Step for a short duration | Defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake - Turtle Island (secret boss) in The New West (requires Loong Scales) | Breath Of Fire
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4e/Black-myth-wukong-tiger-relic.jpg)| Tiger Relic| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases critical hit chance for a short duration. | Found beneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge (Requires Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone), on a platform above the slope down towards Xu Dog Need to jump as soon as you start sliding | Tiger Relic
![Goat Skull .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f9/Goat_Skull_.jpg)| Goat Skull| Rare | Using the gourd moderately increases maximum health for a short duration. | Chance to be found when picking up Licorice plants | Goat Skull"
        - Following Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker
![Breath Of Fire .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0d/Breath_Of_Fire_.jpg)| Breath Of Fire| Epic | Using the gourd significantly increases attack for the next Unveiling Strike in Cloud Step for a short duration | Defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake - Turtle Island (secret boss) in The New West (requires Loong Scales) | Breath Of Fire"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, likely a relic or artifact placed on a wooden tray. Based on the surrounding text, it is part of a guide detailing rare and epic items and their effects when used with a gourd. The preceding and following text describe similar items with unique abilities and locations, suggesting this image represents another collectible relic with specific gameplay benefits and a distinct acquisition method.
